Action item description: PostgreSQL doesn't support the PIVOT clause for SELECT statements
Recommended action: Revise your code to use a procedure to prepare data and then return data as a view.

Action item description: PostgreSQL doesn't support views with the INVALID status
PostgreSQL doesn't support LISTAGG functions with the ON OVERFLOW clause.
Recommended action: Revise your code to use another function or create a user-defined function.

Action item description: This conversion uses machine learning models that generate predictions based on patterns in data
Recommended action: Machine learning output is probabilistic and should be reviewed for accuracy, including human evaluation, as needed for your use case.

Action item description: DMS SC can't convert the SELECT statement
Recommended action: Revise your SELECT statement and try again.

Action item description: Converted code might produce different results compared to the source code
Recommended action: Review the converted code to make sure that it produces the same results as the source code. Rewrite dynamic statements in your source code, then try to convert again.

Action item description: Specify the precision and scale values for your source column
Recommended action: To improve the conversion and use the optimized data type mapping, specify the precision and scale values for the column in your source code. Then, convert the table again.
Verify if the unresolved object is present in the database. If it isn't, check the object name or add the object. If the object is present, transform the code manually.
